articles.title: The second 'Halo' season has a release date and a teaser trailer - The Verge
articles.description: Paramount Plus dropped the first teaser trailer for Halo season two and announced that the new episodes now have a February release date.
articles.content:

articles.title: Box Office: Beyoncé’s ‘Renaissance’ Eyes $21M-Plus Opening as ‘Napoleon,’ ‘Wish’ Fall Off a Cliff - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Elsewhere, Japanese pic 'Godzilla Minus One' is a surprise win for cinema owners, with a projected $7 million to $10 million opening in North America.
articles.content:
Beyoncé’s new concert film is delivering the goods at the box office, where it’s headed for the biggest early December opening in two decades.
